To add more user to this room share this page URL with your friends! (if you add some =))
After the game started, once you be add in it and after the dealer give you cards:

- Click on a card from your hand (this area) to play it.
- Click on a card from the playing area to take it back to your hand (yaniv or if you did a mistake).
- You can drag and drop a card from your hand to rearrange them by toggling the play/reorder switch
- You can right click on a card to see more action (hand, pile, deck, tricks...)
- If you ware expeld, in spectator mode, you can always ask to go back by refreshing the page
